title: CopyPal
tagline: Temporary, cross-device clipboard with file sharing powered by blockchain storage.
description: A temporary clipboard that allows users to share text and files across devices with customizable expiration times. Built on Golem blockchain for secure, decentralized storage with automatic cleanup.
golemDetails: CopyPal uses in-memory storage with manual expiration tracking. Client performs browser-based Proof of Work (difficulty 18) to prevent spam. Items are stored with timestamps and custom expiration dates. Email notifications via SendGrid for magic link authentication.
features: Text and file sharing across devices
Custom expiration times with calendar picker
Dark theme UI with responsive design

apiEndpoints.description: Create new clipboard item (text or file)

fileSupport.supportedTypes: All file types via base64 encoding

deployment.backend: Docker with Bun runtime on port 19234
deployment.caching: Nginx cache headers for static assets
